vulnerability_findings.name: external-function
external-function
external-function
external-function
solc-version
vulnerability_findings.message:
Detected issues with version pragma in patch_14.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.19 (patch_14.sol#1): it allows old versions

vulnerability_findings.name: low-level-calls
vulnerability_findings.message:
Low level call in Token.withdrawToken (patch_14.sol#28-34):
	-require(bool)(_token.call(bytes4(keccak256()(transfer(address,uint256))),_to,_amount)) patch_14.sol#33
